derivation: from the prolonged form of G2309 (θέλημα);
strongs_def: a determination (properly, the thing), i.e. (actively) choice (specially, purpose, decree; abstractly, volition) or (passively) inclination
outline:
1. what one wishes or has determined shall be done
    1. of the purpose of God to bless mankind through Christ
    2. of what God wishes to be done by us
      1. commands, precepts
    3. will, choice, inclination, desire, pleasure
